name: Distracted Mind
description: A tendency to wander across thoughts and ideas, often leading to unexpected creativity and insights.

name: Hope-ful/less Romantic
description: An individual's capacity to oscillate between deep, optimistic love and the despair of unrequited feelings.

name: Eternal Debt
description: A burden or obligation that feels unending, influencing decisions and actions across a lifetime.

name: Eclipsed Soul
description: A state where one's true essence is overshadowed by external influences or internal struggles, seeking light.

name: Echoes of the Past
description: The resonance of previous experiences or histories that shape and influence decisions and actions across a lifetime.
